text: Hi
Hello there. How are you?
i am good..thank u..
Are we supposed to discuss a donation amount? I am a little unclear.
this donation is for "save the children" purpose
Children from where?
the charity name is "save the children"
Do you have to choose an amount to donate too?
yes..even i have to donate too.. but i would like to get some donation from you
Well, I am willing to contribute .50.
that is so kind of you..thank u so much for your help and big heart
No problem. You as well for your donation.
even i will gibe .50
That's a good number.  I think it's fair, especially since a little bit typically goes a long way in the charities.
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
I assume that comes in the form of a bonus as the task is only .30 to complete. I find it odd though that they don't provide us with a lot of information about the charity to thoroughly discuss it.
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

There we go. I thought it was an international organization. I will admit that if it was a U.S. based charity, I would have donated more. I really feel there should be more focus on charities in our county. However, that's not to say that Save the Children isn't a good or meaningful charity.
that' s ok.. you will get more chances to donate. Still you can donate more if you are really interested
That's okay. I think I'm good with the .50 for right now. Thanks.
You can refer to Save the Children's website to gather more information if you like to.   URL
